errors.duration_gte_payable: Duration should be greater or equal than payable at days

errors.minimum_duration: Duration should be greater than {minimum} days
errors.minimum_interest_rate: The rate should be greater than {minimum}
errors.minimum_payable: Payable at should be greater than {minimum} days
errors.parcel_price: Amount required should be less than parcel price

mortgage.partial_payment_desc: You are about to make a partial payment for the mortgage to buy the land {parcel_name}. Outstading amount: {outstanding_amount}
mortgage.request_land: You are about to request a mortgage for {parcel_name} valued in {parcel_price}

parcel_buy.needs_at_least: You need at least {mana} in order to buy this LAND.

parcel_cancel.not_for_sale: The parcel {parcel} is not for sale.

errors.maximum_land_price: The maximum LAND price is {value} MANA
errors.minimum_land_price: The minimum LAND price is {value} MANA

parcel_publish.set_land_price: Set a price and an expiration date for {parcel_name}.

parcel_transfer.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, the details are below.

sign_in.account_unlocked: Make sure your account is unlocked
sign_in.intro: First off you’ll need a safe place to keep all your LAND.

options.desktop: You can use the {metamask_link} extension or a hardware wallet like {ledger_nano_link}.
options.mobile: You can use mobile browsers such as {toshi_link} or {imtoken_link}.

transaction.approved: You authorized the {marketplace_contract_link} to operate MANA on your behalf
transaction.authorize: You {action} the {marketplace_contract_link} to operate LAND on your behalf
transaction.cancel_mortgage: You cancel a Mortgage to buy the parcel {parcel_link}
transaction.create_mortgage: You requested a Mortgage to buy the parcel {parcel_link}
transaction.disapproved: You unauthorized the {marketplace_contract_link} to operate MANA on your behalf
transaction.edit: You edited {parcel_link} with the name "{name}" and description "{description}"
transaction.manage: You gave {address_link} permission to update the contents of {parcel_link}
transaction.manage_revoked: You revoked {address_link} permission to update the contents of {parcel_link}
transaction.mortgage_mana: You {action} the {mortgage_contract_link} to operate MANA on your behalf.
transaction.mortgage_rcn: You {action} the {mortgage_contract_link} to operate RCN on your behalf.
transaction.pay_mortgage: You made a partial payment of {amount} MANA for the mortgage to buy the parcel {parcel_link}
